title.en: Estonian Nature and Natural Building Materials

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course focuses on traditional colours/paints. Students become familiar with and use traditional paints (flax oil paints, Swedish red, tar and tar-based paints), finishing products (flax and other oils, beeswax, natural varnishes, milk products), with their making and usage. From the perspective of production building materials such as clay, sand, plant masses, dung, etc. are discussed.
description.et: Kursusel õpitakse tundma ja kasutama traditsioonilisi värve (linaõlivärvid, rootsipunane, tõrv ja tõrvavärvid), viimistlusvahendeid (lina- jm õlid, mesilasvaha, looduslikud lakid, piimasaadused), nende valmistamist ja kasutamist; käsitletakse teostuslikust aspektist savi, liiva, taimemasse, sõnnikut jms kui ehitusmaterjale.

objectives.en: Provide knowledge and readiness for using materials of little treatment in building process.
objectives.et: Anda eelteadmised ja valmidus ehitamisel looduslike ja vähetöödeldud materjalide kasutamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course students:
- have preliminary knowledge of natural materials to learn more about;
- have an overview of major natural building and finishig materials;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab ülevaadet peamistest looduslikest ehitus- ja viimistlusmaterjalidest;

learning_outcomes.en: - have preliminary knowledge for using natural materials, and materials of little treatment in building.
learning_outcomes.et: - omab eelteadmisi looduslike ja vähetöödeldud materjalide kasutamiseks ehituses.
